blocks.content:
Congratulations on completing this journey! Job well done!

We hope you've enjoyed traveling with us as you:

- Learned about the value of observability and monitoring a Linux server
- Installed the Linux server integration
- Learned how to use pre-built dashboards and alerts to identify and troubleshoot problems in your environment

**More to explore (optional)**

The world is your oyster! Read more about how you can:

- [Monitor alerts](/docs/grafana-cloud/alerting-and-irm/alerting/monitor-status)
- [Get started with incident response](/docs/grafana-cloud/alerting-and-irm/irm/incident/get-started)
- [Set up Slack to manage incidents](/docs/grafana-cloud/alerting-and-irm/irm/irm-slack)
- [Set up a Service Level Objective](/docs/grafana-cloud/alerting-and-irm/slo/set-up)
- [Scale your deployment](/docs/grafana-cloud/send-data/fleet-management)

**Related paths**

Consider taking the following paths after you complete this journey:

- [Explore data using Metrics Drilldown](/docs/learning-paths/drilldown-metrics/)
- [Explore logs using Logs Drilldown](/docs/learning-paths/drilldown-logs/)
- [Monitor collector health using Grafana Fleet Management](/docs/learning-paths/fleet-mgt-monitor-health/)
